duties_responsibilities.duty: Create, manage, and maintain sustainable merchandising revenue growth at key retail accounts in all distribution channels.
Oversee and mentor the sales team, managing sales reps and distributor partners to implement retail sales growth initiatives and develop promotions.
Act as a brand ambassador, key influencer, and change agent serving retailers, distributors, outside sales reps, licensors, and promotional clients.
Develop pricing proposals for all new products and sales channels, and review pricing recommendations from the sales team.
Lead weekly sales meetings with the North American team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Advertising, Marketing, or similar preferred. Minimum 10 years experience in retail-related buying, product development, and/or sales at a manufacturer, retailer, rep group, distributor, or licensor.
